channel.title: Unnecessary Griefing & Teleportation
channel.description:
Although it isn't a big deal, MongolianBeef and Reyx7 destroyed some items in my house, such as doors, smooth stone, and ladders. Also, both MongolianBeef and Reyx7 teleported to my home and killed me. I was in my watch tower and I had an eye on everything and I turned my back and he was behind me. He could not have climbed up my tower without me noticing, so the only way he got here was by some form of teleportation.
His alibi is that he crouched so I couldn't see his name. Great, but like I said, I could have seen his body if he actually walked all the way to my house. I don't have picture proof because there is no way to capture someone in the act of teleporting.
I don't want either of them banned but I just wish they would stop. If you are going to raid me use the front door of my castle, don't break through unnecessary obstacles such as my smooth stone.

item.title: Unnecessary Griefing & Teleportation
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

Also, in defense of reyx7, speedhacking is no longer possible with the 1.6.* updates.

Wrong, the only thing added against speedhacking was block breaking, which came in 1.4.

Read full topic

item.title: Unnecessary Griefing & Teleportation
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Ⅽole, post:1, topic:399374”]Also, in defense of reyx7, speedhacking is no longer possible with the 1.6.* updates.[/quote]Pretty sure that’s false, as I’ve seen and banned people for doing it after that.

Read full topic

item.title: Unnecessary Griefing & Teleportation
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

LilXCj:

Again another problem with Reyx with his extra annoying pvp arguments.

He’s claiming I teleported. You know damn well I can’t.

item.title: Unnecessary Griefing & Teleportation
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

As you probably know, there is no teleportation. The only type of ‘teleporting’ possible is if he slept in your bed then died someplace else and spawned there.

Read full topic

item.title: Unnecessary Griefing & Teleportation
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Mopar_X Mr Mopar X
item.description:
@Mr_Mopar_X wrote:

It doesn’t matter, what you don’t understand is my tower overlooks every spot, so I would have seen you from far away. And I only shot him twice after he appeared out of nowhere.

Read full topic

item.title: Unnecessary Griefing & Teleportation
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

Mongol was on the north, I snuck around behind u and dug through the back. You where busy shooting him with ur bow, while I slowly climbed up the ladder and killed you. Now, when u respawned, i went down a level of ur tower and broke the top ladder, which would stall me a second on how to get out. I then broke a fence, jumped down 5 blocks, then broke through his wall and fled.
I should note Mongol was a great distraction, and also, there is NO way to teleport. Mods can’t be written to do such, as that would be server sided.

Read full topic

item.title: Unnecessary Griefing & Teleportation
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Pretty sure you can’t teleport. But maybe it was speed hacking, who knows. We can’t do anything without proof though.

Read full topic
